paragraphs.text:
%md ## DIMSUM
### Dimension Independent Matrix Square using MapReduce
* Sample sparse columns (many zero's) at a higher probability
* Sample dense columns (many non-zero's) at a lower probability

### Intuition: _Reduce shuffle_ by sampling dense columns less since they exist in more trials

[Databricks Blog Post](https://databricks.com/blog/2014/10/20/efficient-similarity-algorithm-now-in-spark-twitter.html)

result.msg:
DIMSUM

Dimension Independent Matrix Square using MapReduce

  • Sample sparse columns (many zero's) at a higher probability
  • Sample dense columns (many non-zero's) at a lower probability

Intuition: Reduce shuffle by sampling dense columns less since they exist in more trials

Databricks Blog Post

paragraphs.title: Setup Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix
                                        
val data = Array(  //  doc1,  doc2,  doc3
                Array(  0.0,   1.0,   2.0), // word1 (     , 0.98 , 0.77 )
                Array(  2.0,   3.0,   2.0), // word2 (     ,      , 0.88 )
                Array(  4.0,   5.0,   2.0)  // word3 (     ,      ,      )
           ) 

val rows = sc.parallelize(data).map { row =>
  Vectors.dense(row)
}.cache()

val mat = new RowMatrix(rows)

paragraphs.title: Compute Approximate column Similarities using DIMSUM
